Package com.luigisgro.cqf.hjm

Core package with the implementation of the Monte Carlo simulation framework MultiFactorModel specifically for the HJM model (MultiFactorHJM) and the implementation of some interest rate derivative models to be used with it.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
XletFactory<T extends TimePoint> Factory interface for creation of caplets and floorlets
 

Class Summary
Cap<T extends TimePoint> Implements a Cap by providing the caplet payoff
Floor<T extends TimePoint> Implements a Floor by providing the floorlet payoff
ForwardInterestRate<T extends TimePoint> This class calculates the forward rate for a given tenor, based on a curve time series of instantaneous interest rates.
MultiFactorHJM An implementation of MultiFactorModel providing the Heath Jarrow Morton / Musiela model for evolution of interest rates
SeriesOfOptions<T extends TimePoint> Structure common to Cap and Floor, which uses simple caplets and floorlets to implement the complex evaluation of these derivatives
Xlet<T extends TimePoint> This class embeds the common logic of a caplet and floorlet.
ZCB<T extends TimePoint> Discount operator.
 

Package com.luigisgro.cqf.hjm Description

Core package with the implementation of the Monte Carlo simulation framework MultiFactorModel specifically for the HJM model (MultiFactorHJM) and the implementation of some interest rate derivative models to be used with it.
